pkgmetadata.longdescription: Autoregressive and Moving Average Symmetric Models // Functions for fitting the Autoregressive and Moving Average Symmetric Model for univariate time series introduced by Maior and Cysneiros (2018), doi:10.1007/s00362-016-0753-z. Fitting method: conditional maximum likelihood estimation. For details see: Wei (2006), Time Series Analysis: Univariate and Multivariate Methods, Section 7.2.
